head-description: Bludit is a web application to build your own website or blog in seconds, it's completely free and open source. Markdown support.
bludit-slogan1: Create your own Website or Blog in seconds
bludit-feature1: Bludit uses files in JSON format to store the content, you don't need to install or configure a database.
bludit-feature2: Customize your Bludit powered site with beautiful and cool themes. You can download themes from the official site.
bludit-feature3: Extend Bludit's functionality with amazing plugins. You can download plugins from the official site.
bludit-feature4: Bludit incorporates all the SEO tools to improve your ranking in all the search engines and social networks.
bludit-feature5: Bludit supports Markdown and HTML code for the content, also provide Markdown Editor and WYSIWYG Editor.
bludit-feature6: Bludit takes care of the security and privacy of the users. Bludit doesn't track or uses any external resources.
bludit-documentation: Read our documentation for requirements, installation guide, how to's and more.
bludit-support: Do you need support? Reach us in the forum, chat or Github issues.
